The AI then posed questions to the user regarding the button's positioning within the app and its visual design, providing two options for each question. The user also received a checklist of additional features to consider implementing, which included options like an interactive product carousel and a user rating system. Subsequently, the user repeated their request for adding the "hadoken" button, prompting the AI to reiterate its acknowledgment and present another set of questions regarding the button's screen placement and action upon being pressed. The user then asked for an email form to be added to the project, specifically for contacting Santa, to which the AI expressed interest in details about the project. The AI's responses reflected efficiency, noting its readiness to incorporate all requested features while seeking user preferences for the implementation details.

The AI confirmed the addition of the shoryuken and hadoken buttons and acknowledged the request to fix a syntax error. The AI also asked the user where they would like the shoryuken and hadoken buttons positioned within the app and what actions they should trigger, offering two options for each question. The user provided their preferences, and the AI acknowledged their inputs.

Additionally, the AI provided lists of potential features for the project, including user profile customization, real-time stock indicators, community ratings, and notifications. Finally, the user requested an email form for contacting Santa. The AI acknowledged this request and asked the user to clarify the desired placement and details of the form, which the user also responded to. Throughout the conversation, the AI consistently confirmed tasks and offered to integrate the suggested features into the project while collecting the user's input for optimal design decisions.
